You are encouraged to copy, reproduce, adapt, alter, or otherwise make use of this translation in any way you wish. Attribution is appreciated but not legally required.

segments.pli: Aṅguttara Nikāya 5
1. Sekhabalavagga
10. Dutiyaagāravasutta
“Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu agāravo appatisso abhabbo imasmiṃ dhammavinaye vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjituṃ.
segments.en: “Mendicants, a disrespectful and irreverent mendicant with five qualities can’t achieve growth, improvement, or maturity in this teaching and training.

segments.pli: Katamehi pañcahi?
Assaddho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu agāravo appatisso abhabbo imasmiṃ dhammavinaye vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjituṃ.
segments.en: A disrespectful and irreverent mendicant who is faithless …

segments.pli: Ahiriko, bhikkhave, bhikkhu agāravo appatisso abhabbo imasmiṃ dhammavinaye vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjituṃ.
Anottappī, bhikkhave, bhikkhu agāravo appatisso abhabbo imasmiṃ dhammavinaye vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjituṃ.
Kusīto, bhikkhave, bhikkhu agāravo appatisso abhabbo imasmiṃ dhammavinaye vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjituṃ.
Duppañño, bhikkhave, bhikkhu agāravo appatisso abhabbo imasmiṃ dhammavinaye vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjituṃ.
segments.en: witless can’t achieve growth, improvement, or maturity in this teaching and training.

segments.pli: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu agāravo appatisso abhabbo imasmiṃ dhammavinaye vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjituṃ.
segments.en: A disrespectful and irreverent mendicant with these five qualities can’t achieve growth, improvement, or maturity in this teaching and training.

segments.pli: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu sagāravo sappatisso bhabbo imasmiṃ dhammavinaye vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjituṃ.
segments.en: A respectful and reverent mendicant with five qualities can achieve growth, improvement, and maturity in this teaching and training.

segments.pli: Katamehi pañcahi?
Saddho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sagāravo sappatisso bhabbo imasmiṃ dhammavinaye vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjituṃ.
segments.en: A respectful and reverent mendicant who is faithful …

segments.pli: Hirīmā, bhikkhave, bhikkhu … pe … ottappī, bhikkhave, bhikkhu … pe … āraddhavīriyo, bhikkhave, bhikkhu … pe … paññavā, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sagāravo sappatisso bhabbo imasmiṃ dhammavinaye vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjituṃ.
segments.en: conscientious … prudent … energetic … wise can achieve growth, improvement, and maturity in this teaching and training.

segments.pli: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu sagāravo sappatisso bhabbo imasmiṃ dhammavinaye vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjitun”ti.
segments.en: A respectful and reverent mendicant with these five qualities can achieve growth, improvement, and maturity in this teaching and training.”

segments.pli: Dasamaṃ.
Sekhabalavaggo paṭhamo.
Saṅkhittaṃ vitthataṃ dukkhā,
bhataṃ sikkhāya pañcamaṃ;
Samāpatti ca kāmesu,
cavanā dve agāravāti.

sections.title: “Mendicants, a disrespectful and irreverent mendicant with five qualities…

suttaplex.blurb: A mendicant with five bad qualities can’t grow in the Dharma.
